plot: A series of murders occur in a convent in central Italy. A police detective from Rome is delegated to investigate about the case. A novice who arrived the first night is suspicious.
title: La quindicesima epistola
plot_es: A series of murders occur in a convent in central Italy. A police detective from Rome is delegated to investigate about the case. A novice who arrived the first night is suspicious.
plot_en: A series of murders occur in a convent in central Italy. A police detective from Rome is delegated to investigate about the case. A novice who arrived the first night is suspicious.
